name: The Messenger (itch) (James_Seton)
description:
Traverse through this top-down battlefield as you attempt to survive encounter's and defeat the enemy combatant's!

Bringing classic military combat style gameplay to the world of top-down pixel art, this game combines that pixel art charm with the endless fun of FPS 

As you move through your environment defeat the enemy and reach for victory! Gameplay is brought to life through a range of mechanics featuring: 

  • cool Ai enemies that react to player actions
  • Ai which will Hunt, Flee, Attack and defend against the player throughout combat
  • overworld map navigation for level selection
  • classic pixel art style inspired by titles such as Chrono Trigger and Pokémon

So Download today and Fight!
